properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 20 at 9:14AM EST until February 21 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt. Seas 5
to 9 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-
North Carolina border out to 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
